title: LEARN THIS INCREDIBLY SIMPLE FIX FOR YOUR QUICK HITCH.

tasks.task: Explain the features and benefits of Spico quick hitches.
subtasks: Mention compatibility with compact tractors from 4066R down to 1025R.
Highlight the absence of bushings and direct fit with 7 eighths pin.
Compare to other quick hitches requiring category three bushings.

tasks.task: Present a troubleshooting tip for quick hitch alignment issues.
subtasks: Describe a common problem with rototilling equipment and quick hitches.
指点 how to adjust lower brackets to equalize spacing on both sides of the center pin.
Mention its PTO-driven operation, electric seat dump, and bagger.
Note the availability in 48 or 60 inch widths.
Highlight capabilities like walnut, pine cone, leaf, and clipping pickup.
